definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: He still stuck on the answer although he had checked several times.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经过数次验算，他还是对该答案不敢相信。

sentences.english: The strength of bucket belts is calculated and checked.
sentences.chinese: 对畚斗带强度进行了验算和校核。

sentences.english: Analysing and calculating the strength of generator frame and rotor with finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 利用有限元方法分析验算了机座和转子的强度。

sentences.english: Coiler cost estimate is performed through self-learning method.
sentences.chinese: 以开卷机为例对自学习式成本估算法进行验算。

sentences.english: And it's also researched that the method of design and checking calculation.
sentences.chinese: 并研究了体外预应力加固结构的设计和验算方法。

sentences.english: The deflection and the crack width of the SRC transfer girder are calculated.
sentences.chinese: 验算钢骨混凝土转换梁的挠度和裂缝宽度。

sentences.english: Their reliability and practicality are tested and verified by an engineering example.
sentences.chinese: 经对工程实例验算，验证了本研究的可靠性和实用性。

sentences.english: Checking the stree of the structure.
sentences.chinese: 并验算了结构的成桥应力。

sentences.english: The calculated results are shown to agree with experimental data of push-out tests.
sentences.chinese: 验算结果表明，本文公式与试验结果符合良好。

sentences.english: The paper presents how to check starting time and motors power.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了启动时间和电机功率的验算方法。

sentences.english: Second, checking computations of many dashes of steel supporting and the optimization of steel supporting waist beam.
sentences.chinese: 基坑开挖时多道钢支撑的验算及钢支撑的优化。

definition: to do a sum in writing/written calculation
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
